benefits.Name: Sony Liv (Mobile Only)
benefits.Description: Watch live sports, original shows, movies, and more.
benefits.fullDetails:
About Sony Liv:

Get 1 year of Sony Liv (Mobile Only) subscription and get to enjoy the following:

  • Live sports like Cricket, Soccer, Tennis, eSports, Racing, Fight Sports, and Athletics.
  • Exclusive Sony LIV Hindi Originals that will be dubbed and subbed across top Indian languages (Hindi, Malayalam, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Bengali, Marathi, Punjabi)
  • Blockbuster regional movies containing top stars from Malayalam (Mammooti, Dulquer Salman), Kannada (Puneeth Rajkumar) and other industries dubbed in South languages
  • Top Indian TV shows like The Kapil Sharma Show, Kaun Banega Crorepati (Indian version of Who Wants To Be A Millionaire), Shark Tank India, Indian Idol along with popular TV shows across Sony's 20+ network channels

Steps to Redeem:

  • Visit https://www.sonyliv.com/activate_offer on your mobile web browser or website.
  • Sign-in with your mobile number
  • Create or select your profile
  • Input the Coupon Code received and click on Activate Offer

Terms & Conditions:

  • This code is issued and is the property of by Culver Max Entertainment Private Limited India (CMEPL) (formerly known as Sony Pictures Networks India Private Limited)
  • This code can only be redeemed in India and is valid till 11/04/2024.
  • This code cannot be used/clubbed with an existing subscription / offer on the SonyLIV app or website or any other source.
  • This code is non-refundable and cannot be transferred for value or redeemed for cash. It is not a credit/debit code. This code is not a legal tender & does not entail any civil/criminal liability on CMEPL.
  • Culver Max Entertainment Private Limited India shall not be held responsible for any misuse, theft, transfer occurred after the purchase of the code.
  • Any dispute arising with respect to the code will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of competent courts in Mumbai. The existence of any dispute if any will not constitute any claim towards CMEPL.
  • Use of this code constitutes acceptance of the terms and conditions as available on https://www.sonyliv.com/terms-of-use.
  • © 2022 Culver Max Entertainment Private Limited India (formerly known as Sony Pictures Networks India Private Limited). All rights reserved.
